about.name: Victoire Schubert
about.title: Software Engineer • Frontend & Creative Development
about.summary: I’m a French software engineer who builds thoughtful, human-centered digital experiences. With strong expertise in frontend development and a growing focus on creative coding (Three.js, WebGL, animations), I love turning ideas into intuitive, elegant interfaces. I value clean architecture, collaboration with design teams, and crafting products that are both useful and a pleasure to use.

experience.summary: Frontend engineer within a cross-functional product team, contributing to web applications used across the Decathlon ecosystem. I collaborate closely with designers, engineers, and product stakeholders to deliver reliable, accessible interfaces. My work includes UI implementation, improving developer experience, and participating actively in the team’s tech watch and knowledge-sharing culture.

Designed and developed internal tools within a large-scale governmental environment. Learned professional engineering workflows while contributing production-ready code. Reinforced my foundation in software architecture, testing, documentation, and long-term maintainability.

projects.name: Tempo Pose
projects.description: A figure-drawing timer application built for artists. Simple, distraction-free interface with custom session presets, keyboard shortcuts, and a smooth, elegant UI. Designed to help creatives practice gesture drawing and maintain flow.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: A full-stack personal finance tracker designed as a real-world engineering exercise. Includes a Supabase-hosted PostgreSQL database, a NestJS-style backend structure, and a clean, modern frontend with authentication, categories, transaction logging, and analytics.

contact.availability: Open to freelance opportunities (Frontend, Creative Development, Web Animation, Next.js).
